description.black-white:
The user attacks by harshly dropping
an icicle onto the target.
It may also make the target flinch.

The user attacks by harshly dropping
an icicle onto the target.
It may also make the target flinch.
description.x-y:

large icicles onto the target.
This may also make the target flinch.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
